Test description: Hitting a ball into a pocket
Expected outcome: As soon as the centre of the ball touches the pocket, it should be removed

Test description: Hitting a ball into another ball
Expected outcome: Upon hitting the other ball, two balls should collide and recoil from eachother

Test description: Hitting a ball into the table wall
Expected outcome: Upon hitting the table wall, the ball should recoil and go in the other direction
